Description: Robly; a leading innovator in small business marketing automation.
Name: Robly

Methods.Name: Get All Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets details of all contacts including those with status settings subscribed, unsubscribed and deleted.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets details of all contacts that have been updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Unsubscribe By Contact ID
Methods.Description: Unsubscribe a Contact by using their 'Contact ID' as identification.

Methods.Name: Unsubscribe By Email Address
Methods.Description: Unsubscribe a Contact by using their 'Email Address' as identification.

Methods.Name: Resubscribe By Contact ID
Methods.Description: Resubscribe a Contact by using their 'Contact ID' as identification.

Methods.Name: Resubscribe By Email Address
Methods.Description: Resubscribe a Contact by using their 'Email Address' as identification.

Methods.Name: Add Contact to List by Email
Methods.Description: Add a contact to a list using their 'Email Address' as identification.

Methods.Name: Add Contact to List by ID
Methods.Description: Add a contact to a list using their 'Contact ID' as identification.

Methods.Name: Get Unsubscribed Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets details of all unsubscribed contacts.

Methods.Name: Update Contact By ID
Methods.Description: Updates a contact using the Contact ID as identification.

Methods.Name: Update Contact By Email
Methods.Description: Updates a contact using the Contact's email address  as identification.

Methods.Name: Get Subscribed Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets details of all subscribed contacts.
